amendment.description: To provide that certain local educational agencies shall be eligible to receive a fiscal year 2005 payment under section 8002 or 8003 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1422 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1422 proposed by Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S8735-8738; text: CR S8736) To provide that certain local educational agencies shall be eligible to receive a fiscal year 2005 payment under section 8002 or 8003 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1422 proposed by Senator Salazar.
